name: Spectra (itch) (Jiro Dela Cruz)
description:
The year is 30XX, Earth and its society have been reduced to rubble and only you remain. Test your skill as you run, jump and stomp through a desolate city in this fast-paced 2D platformer.

Features:

- Hone your parkour skills.

- Dodge death by via spikes by only a hair.  

- Crash through crates with your signature groundpound ability.

- Spring to the skies with bounce pads littered through the land.

- Swing around and fly off poles.
